Howto:
1)download and install last idea9, idea10 and idea11 source code

2)svn checkout from http://code.google.com/p/intellij-maven/source/browse/#svn%2Ftrunk%2Fintellij-maven
   
3) Create new profile in pom.xml in intellij-maven directory for youself like existing one:
<code language="xml">
{{{
   <profile>
      <id>mpl</id>
      <activation>
        <property>
          <name>env.COMPUTERNAME</name>
          <value>MOSKAU</value>
        </property>
      </activation>
      <properties>
        <idea9.home>D:/Projekte/Idea/ideaIC-95.627</idea9.home>
        <idea10.home>D:/Projekte/Idea/ideaIC-107.777</idea10.home>
        <idea11.home>D:/Projekte/Idea/ideaIC-117.418</idea11.home>
      </properties>
    </profile>
}}}
</code>    
    Use your own directories for idea9, idea10 and idea11 places!
    
4) run "mvn clean" and "mvn install" in intellij-maven directory. Check for successful build.
5) run "mvn clean" and "mvn install -DIntelliJ=10" in intellij-maven directory. Check for successful build.
6) run "mvn clean" and "mvn install -DIntelliJ=9" in intellij-maven directory. Check for successful build.

--> now you should be able to build lombok-intellij-plugin with maven on command line.

7) Install new Idea-plugin: "IntelliJ plugin modul maven importer" (http://plugins.intellij.net/plugin/?idea&id=7054) (Plugin is available in IntelliJ-IDEA)
8) Setup JDK in IntelliJ
9) Setup IntelliJ Idea plugin SDKs (9, 10 and 11) in IntelliJ

10) Import lombok-intellij-plugin projekt as maven project.
11) Check and change as needed Projekt-JDK and Plugin-JDK for plugin modul in IntelliJ for imported lombok-intellij-plugin projekt

--> now you should be able to build lombok-intellij-plugin with IntelliJ-Idea too.
